title: Gloria Vanderbilt Women's Amanda Classic High Rise Tapered Jean Plus Size
description: STYLE - Classic high rise taper jean sits at natural waist with functional pockets, easy zipper fly and belt loops for the fit you love.
VERSATILITY - Goes great with all tops from fashionable to basic T-shirts and all footwear from stylish boots to your favorit shoes.
LENGTH - This high rise pant have a 31 inch average inseam, 29 inch short inseam and 33 inch long inseam with a 15 inch leg opening.
AVAILABILITY - Offered in many different colors, prints as well as details, see color name for specifics
BRAND - Effortlessly fun and stylish Gloria Vanderbilt is a versatile yet classic look that attracts and connects with the modern sensibility of consumers of all ages.
Gloria Vanderbilt Women's Amanda Classic High Rise Tapered Jean Plus Size
